name: Infernal Labour Union 666
description:
Work is hell, so you can imagine what work in Hell must be like! 

Tired of millenia of drudgery and oppression, the workers of Hell have given up punching in to work and decided it's time to punch up against their evil overlords!
It is up to you to lead the firebrands and hellions of Infernal Labour Union 666 as they go on strike for less hellish working conditions.

  • Battle through hordes of riot police, union busters, and even HR on your way to deposing the Princes of Hell!
  • Recruit powerful allies to help in the fight against corporate evil!
  • Discover thousands of different synergies by combining different allies, power-ups, weapons, and playable characters!

  

Feed our Backs!

Hi, we're a small team of 2 game developers and this is our first major project together, so we could use your help!

It would mean a lot to us if you could fill out our feedback form after trying out the demo. We will use the information you give us to improve the game as we work towards the full release! As a token of our gratitude, we will even put your (user)name in the credits of the game!
